title: Cover Story: Dynamic Duo: 75 Indira and Lt. Gen.Satish Nambiar (retd) Breaking Barriers

quotes: Receiving UN Secretary General Kofi Annan at the United Service Institution of India in 2000; also in the picture is Chief of Naval Staff Admiral Sushil Kumar.
With George Clooney at a dinner in New Delhi: 2005.
However, you must remember that the year was 1970, when one pretty much did as one was told.
